department: Departement of Fisheries and Oceans Canada
description: A wide format multi-function printer for the DFO, this contract is for the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment, as well as the necessary training, in French and English.
full_summary:
# Wide Format Multi-Function Printer Acquisition for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada
======================================

## Solicitation Details

*   **Reference Number:** SSC-23-00022559:T
*   **Solicitation Number:** BPM018720/22559
*   **Publication Date:** April 17, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** June 02, 2023 (14:00:00)
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services

## Contract Overview

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada seeks to acquire a wide format multi-function printer. The contract involves the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment, as well as necessary training in English and French for the end-users to access all the required features.

## Key Requirements

*   The selected supplier must deliver a reliable and efficient wide format multi-function printer that can handle various paper sizes.
*   The equipment must be compatible with the client's existing infrastructure and be easily integrated into their workflow.
*   The supplier must provide comprehensive training to end-users in both English and French, covering the basic operation and advanced features of the printer.

## Selection Criteria

*   Experience in providing wide format multi-function printers to government institutions
*   Quality of the equipment and its compatibility with existing infrastructure
*   Demonstration of the advanced features of the printer
*   Cost of the equipment and related services (installation and training)

## Important Dates

*   Tender Closing Date: June 02, 2023 (14:00:00)
*   Amendment Date: June 01, 2023

## Contact Information

*   Procurement Officer: Channary Luy | Email: [channary.luy@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:channary.luy@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 613-323-5347
*   Fax: 613-123-4567
